questions.prompt: Name the American "public opinion expert" and professor who founded the American Institute of Public Opinion in 1935, ultimately linking his last name inextricably with public polling in the United States.

Companies and entities that offer securities for sale to the public must file with the Securities and Exchange Commission a formal document that legally discloses details about the investment offering, thereby allowing investors to make an informed decision about their potential investment. This document, often part of a larger "registration statement", is known by what one-word name?
What is the name of the headquarters of Greater London's Metropolitan Police, on the Victoria Embankment in Westminster, taken from its original location at the police force's founding in 1829?

"I saw the best minds of my generation destroyed by madness, starving hysterical naked" is the first line of what 1956 poem by Allen Ginsberg that is widely considered the quintessential expression of the 1950s Beat movement?
"Are Jennie and V Dating?" This (edited) headline comes from a 2023 article on the website of Cosmopolitan magazine about members of what two musical groups?
The Shatt al-Arab empties into the Persian Gulf at the end of its 120 miles, having formed in the Iraqi town of Al-Qurnah at the confluence of what other two rivers?
